ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: You and your female partner are having dinner together at a restaurant. A male customer approaches your table. How anxious/concerned would you be that the man might sexually harass you because of your sexual orientation?

You and your female partner are having dinner together at a restaurant. A male customer approaches your table. How likely is it that the man will sexually harass you because of your sexual orientation?

You and your female partner are leaving a store together holding hands. A car drives by and the driver honks the horn loudly several times. How anxious/concerned would you be that the driver might have honked because of your sexual orientation?

You and your female partner are leaving a store together holding hands. A car drives by and the driver honks the horn loudly several times. How likely is it that the driver honked because of your sexual orientation?

You are on a date with a women at a restaurant. Your waiter provides you and your date with poor service. How anxious/concerned would you be that the poor service may have been because of your sexual orientation?
You are on a date with a women at a restaurant. Your waiter provides you and your date with poor service. How likely is it that the poor service was because of your sexual orientation?

You are your female partner are walking together holding hands. Several men are gathered on a corner outside a bar. How anxious/concerned would you be that you may be harassed or assaulted because of your sexual orientation?

You are your female partner are walking together holding hands. Several men are gathered on a corner outside a bar. How likely is it that you will be harassed or assaulted because of your sexual orientation?

You are at a bar with a female friend and an intoxicated male approaches you and attempts to pick you up. You turn him down and he reacts angrily, calling you a ''dyke''. How anxious/concerned would you be that he might physically assault you because of your sexual orientation?

You are at a bar with a female friend and an intoxicated male approaches you and attempts to pick you up. You turn him down and he reacts angrily, calling you a ''dyke''. How likely is it that he will physically assault you because of your sexual orientation?

You and your female partner are looking to buy a house. After looking at a house together with the realtor, the realtor fails to schedule an appointment to view another house that she represents. How anxious/concerned would you be that the realtor may have failed to schedule an appointment because of your sexual orientation?

You and your female partner are looking to buy a house. After looking at a house together with the realtor, the realtor fails to schedule an appointment to view another house that she represents. How likely is it that the realtor failed to schedule an appointment because of your sexual orientation?

A few of your female coworkers regularly try to set you up with men but they never try to set you up with women. How anxious/concerned would you be that they may be doing this because they don't accept your sexual orientation?
A few of your female coworkers regularly try to set you up with men but they never try to set you up with women. How likely is it that they are doing this because of your sexual orientation?

You are hanging out with a group of heterosexual female coworkers, and the subject turns to boyfriends and husbands. How anxious/concerned would you be that they may treat you differently because of your sexual orientation?

You are hanging out with a group of heterosexual female coworkers, and the subject turns to boyfriends and husbands. How likely is it that they would treat you differently because of your sexual orientation?
A new female friend of yours makes negative remarks about lesbians. How anxious/concerned would you be that she may not want to be friends if she knew of your sexual orientation?
A new female friend of yours makes negative remarks about lesbians. How likely is it that she wouldn't want to be friends if she knew of your sexual orientation?

You disclose your sexual orientation to a new friend. Your friend doesn't express concern about it, but your friendship soon drifts apart. How anxious/concerned would you be that the drifting apart of this friendship is because of your sexual orientation?

You disclose your sexual orientation to a new friend. Your friend doesn't express concern about it, but your friendship soon drifts apart. How likely is it that your friendship drifted apart because of your sexual orientation?

You walk into a locker room at the gym and begin to change. A woman near you moves to a different part of the locker room. How anxious/concerned would you be that she may have moved because of your sexual orientation?
You walk into a locker room at the gym and begin to change. A woman near you moves to a different part of the locker room. How likely is it that she may have moved because of your sexual orientation?

Your supervisor begins raising concerns about your performance at work for the first time after you bring your female partner to a company picnic. How anxious/concerned would you be that your supervisor may be raising concerns about your performance at work because of your sexual orientation?

Your supervisor begins raising concerns about your performance at work for the first time after you bring your female partner to a company picnic. How likely is it that your supervisor is raising concerns about your performance at work because of your sexual orientation?

You notice your relatives looking at you and your female partner at a family reunion, but they don't come over to talk to you. How anxious/concerned would you be that they may have not come over to talk to you because of your sexual orientation?

You notice your relatives looking at you and your female partner at a family reunion, but they don't come over to talk to you. How likely is it that they didn't come over to talk to you because of your sexual orientation?

You and your female partner are getting married. Several of your coworkers do not come to the wedding ceremony. How anxious/concerned would you be that they may not have come because of your sexual orientation?
You and your female partner are getting married. Several of your coworkers do not come to the wedding ceremony. How likely is it that they did not come because of your sexual orientation?

The principal at your child's elementary school has never spoken to you and your partner at school events, but you often see him speaking with other parents. How anxious/concerned would you be that he may not have spoken to you because of your sexual orientation?

The principal at your child's elementary school has never spoken to you and your partner at school events, but you often see him speaking with other parents. How likely is it that he doesn't speak to you because of your sexual orientation?

During a lecture on sexual orientation, your professor includes several stereotypes about lesbian and bisexual women as if they were facts. After the lecture, you approach the professor and politely point out the incorrect aspects of the lecture. You receive a lower grade than you expected in the class. How anxious/concerned would you be that you may have received a lower grade in the class because of your sexual orientation?

During a lecture on sexual orientation, your professor includes several stereotypes about lesbian and bisexual women as if they were facts. After the lecture, you approach the professor and politely point out the incorrect aspects of the lecture. You receive a lower grade than you expected in the class. How likely is it that you received a lower grade in the class because of your sexual orientation?
